welcomeText: Discover a world of limitless knowledge! Join us on our 100% free online course platform and turn your dreams into reality.
areUSureWantDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
ifUDeleteLessonVideoAlsoDeleted: If you delete this lesson, its video will also be deleted!
ifUDeleteModuleLessonsAlsoDeleted: If you delete this module, all its lessons will also be deleted!
allHisModulesAndLessonsAlsoDeleted: All his modules and lessons will also be deleted!
name: Name
iWishBeContentCreator: I wish to be a content creator
dontHaveAccountYetCreateOneNow: Don't have an account yet? Create one now!
statementOfResponsibilityTextPart1: The services offered by the Aprenda Online website meet the needs of people who are interested in taking certain courses and in building courses for a specific target audience in education.
statementOfResponsibilityTextPart2: In cases of inappropriate content, racism, and other actions that infringe on human rights, the relevant content will be reported and reviewed by the platform administrator and subsequently deleted.
statementOfResponsibilityTextPart3: If the party does not accept the conditions of the responsibility agreement,
statementOfResponsibilityTextPart4: it can lead to consequences such as:
statementOfResponsibilityTextPart5: Inability to access services, projects or related activities;
statementOfResponsibilityTextPart6: Inability to use software, licenses, and systems;
statementOfResponsibilityTextPart7: Infeasibility to participate in the project subject to the responsibility agreement or contract and even other possible projects.
rateUsWithStarsYourOpinionIsImportant: Rate us with stars! Your opinion is important.
WouldULikeToSendCommentToo: Would you like to send a comment as well?
whatUWantToReport: What do you want to report?
selectLessonUWantReport: Select the lesson you want to report:
WhatWouldULikeToSee: What would you like to see?
courseOverviewDescription: This page includes the total number of students enrolled, the average course rating, the number of reviews received, and the course completion rate.
coursePerformanceDescription: On this page you can see some statistics over time, such as the number of applications, completion rate and other data over time.
ratingsAndFeedbackDescription: Here, you can see all the reviews and comments your course has received. You can use these assessments to improve your course
studentProgressDescription: This page shows how many students have completed each lesson in the course. This can help you understand which parts of the course are most interesting to students.
